title: Ranked
body:
Hi Guys
I would like to know if it is possible to skip divisions due to winning a series in ranked. Also I would like to know if you are able to skip divisions can you skip tiers. Please respond and give me some answers. I am in bronze three at the moment so would it be possible to go to bronze one or even higher?
Another thing I would like to know is can a person be demoted to bronze one after getting into silver? Is the drop caused by inactivity or losing to many games.  
P.S I have posted this thread because while looking on the forums I could not find any relevant information. 
Jomoko2012 :)

replies.body:
Hey Jomoko2012,

You can indeed jump divisions (i.e. Bronze 3 - 1)
You can also jump tiers (i.e. bronze 2 - silver 5)
If you get in silver you can fall back to bronze, but it takes quite a few losses. Your MMR would have to fall to around bronze 4/5 level before you drop from Silver 5 to bronze 1
you can jump without even doing promos like me. was s5 0 lp played 3 games got to 90 lp played 1 more jumped to s3 no promos
Whoa you must have a high MMR then.
On the subject of MMR, is there any official way to check it?
